_header: I trow in God the Father almighty
_description: The Creed — three stanzas rhyme royal

EDU205.First Lines:
I trow in god þe fader almychtymakare of hewyne and erd &
                    alkyne thing…
EDU205.Last Lines:
…In flech and bane be in body & saul be senerys & syne
                    lyf ay lestand lyf but wene
EDU205.Editions:
Stevenson,  George. 
             Pieces from the Makculloch and the Gray MSS. together with The Chepman
                and Myllar Prints.
Scottish Text Society
         65. Edinburgh, 1918: 19.
